Carmelo Anthony and LeBron James were the headliners, but Allen Iverson and JR Josh Smith stole the show. Allen Iverson scored a season-high 37 points and Josh Smith added 29 to help the Denver Nuggets beat the Cleveland Cavaliers 122-100 on Monday night. They didn't steal my spotlight, said Carmelo Anthony , who had 22 points and nine rebounds. "They did what they were supposed to do. They took advantage of the defense that they threw at us." up tents in the city's central Martyrs Square similar to Tahrir. In Cairo, hundreds of state electricity workers stood in front of the South Cairo Electricity company, demanding the ouster of its director. Why are you staying here, you've ruined our lives, they chanted. Also, dozens of state museum workers demanding higher wages staged a protest in front of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, crowding around antiquities chief Zahi Hawass when he came to talk to them.
